value:
Didja know that at this school you're
more respected for the classes you
take instead of your age?

That green-haired student said it may
be best that people don't know I can
commune with spirits. Wonder why?

Hey, you're doing great! You deserve
a break. Let me grab you some water!

I'm so inspired by all the fancy books
here! Do you think even I could
write a book someday?

They say you gotta rest your mind
just like your body. So make sure to
take it easy after all your hard work!

Oh, hi! You're the summoner, right?
The name's Nino! Here on behalf
of $Nf.

If it means creating a more peaceful
world, I'll do my best to stand and
fight by your side!

Hope everyone's watching, 'cause
I'm going all out!

Uh, what? Guess I kinda
messed up...

Wow, thank you! I'm gonna— Uh,
I mean, I shall perform to the
best of my ability!

Hi, I'm Nino! I may not be great at
studying, but I'll work hard to learn
as much as I can!

Growing up, I didn't spend much time
with kids my own age. But I always
dreamed of going to school.$k$pIt sounds pretty nice to learn from
wise teachers, doesn't it? Oh, and
also to play with friends!$k$pI've always wanted to create the kind
of world where people didn't have to
live in fear and uncertainty.$k$pA world where kids can study and fall
in love without a care. Everyone
should be able to live like that.$k$pSo I gotta work even harder to make
it happen! I can count on your help,
right, $Nu?
Here comes the magic!
I'll show ya what I can do!
I'm ready to fight!
It's a BIG one!
Not strong enough yet…
I love festivals. I couldn't get to sleep last night at all!
*gasp* Oh, it's just you.
They say Khadein is a town where people study magic! Did'ya know that?
If I studied really hard, could I help even more? Oh, I hope so.
I'm better at reading than I used to be. Everybody's been so kind to help me.
Festivals would be even more fun if my brothers could go...
The time I spend with you is just plain fun! You're a good friend.
Sounds good!
I dunno...
Here I go!
